title: Igor Kshinin
text: Igor Ivanovich Kshinin (; born July 13, 1972 in <a href="Volgograd">Volgograd</a>) is a retired male <a href="boxing">boxer</a> from <a href="Russia">Russia</a>. He represented his native country at the <a href="1996%20Summer%20Olympics">1996 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Atlanta%2C%20Georgia">Atlanta, Georgia</a>, where he was stopped in the second round of the men's heavyweight division (– 91 kg) by Germany's eventual bronze medalist <a href="Luan%20Krasniqi">Luan Krasniqi</a>.
